capabilityDescription.en: Writes the contents of a FlowFile to MongoDB

en.description: If configured, this property will use the assigned client service for connection pooling.

zh.description: 如果已配置，此属性将使用分配的客户端服务进行连接池。

en.description: When true, inserts a document if no document matches the update query criteria; this property is valid only when using update mode, otherwise it is ignored

zh.description: 当为true时，如果没有文档符合更新查询条件，则插入文档；此属性仅在使用更新模式时有效，否则将忽略

en.description: Key name used to build the update query criteria; this property is valid only when using update mode, otherwise it is ignored. Example: _id

zh.description: 用于构建更新查询条件的关键字名称；此属性仅在使用更新模式时有效，否则将被忽略。示例：_id

en.description: Indicates whether the processor should insert or update content

zh.description: 指示处理器是否应插入或更新内容

en.description: The name of the collection to use
Specify a full MongoDB query to be used for the lookup query to do an update/upsert.

zh.description: 指定用于查找查询的完整MongoDB查询以执行更新/升级。

en.description: Choose an update mode. You can either supply a JSON document to use as a direct replacement or specify a document that contains update operators like $set, $unset, and $inc. When Operators mode is enabled, the flowfile content is expected to be the operator part for example: {$set:{"key": "value"},$inc:{"count":1234}} and the update query will come from the configured Update Query property.

zh.description: 选择更新模式。您可以提供JSON文档作为直接替换，也可以指定包含更新运算符（如$set、$unset和$inc）的文档。启用操作员模式时，流文件内容应该是操作员部分，例如：{$set:{“key”：“value”}、$inc:{“count”：1234}}，更新查询将来自配置的更新查询属性。

en.description: The name of the database to use

zh.description: 要使用的数据库的名称

en.description: The Character Set in which the data is encoded

success.en: All FlowFiles that are written to MongoDB are routed to this relationship
success.zh: 写入MongoDB的所有FlowFiles都将路由到此关系

failure.en: All FlowFiles that cannot be written to MongoDB are routed to this relationship
failure.zh: 无法写入MongoDB的所有FlowFiles都将路由到此关系

en: An instance of this component can cause high usage of this system resource.  Multiple instances or high concurrency settings may result a degradation of performance.
zh: 此组件的实例可能会导致此系统资源的大量使用。多个实例或高并发设置可能会导致性能下降。
